name: arbiter
description: CUE-based specification validation and management CLI with agent-first automation and monorepo architecture

scripts.dev:full: concurrently "bun run typecheck:watch" "NODE_ENV=development AUTH_REQUIRED=false bun run --cwd apps/api dev" "bun run --cwd apps/client dev"
scripts.dev:full:auth: concurrently "bun run typecheck:watch" "OAUTH_DEV_REDIRECT_URI=http://localhost:3000/oauth/callback bun scripts/dev-oauth-server.ts" "NODE_ENV=development AUTH_REQUIRED=true ARBITER_CONFIG_PATH=apps/api/config.dev-oauth.json DISABLE_DEV_AUTH_TOKEN=1 bun run --cwd apps/api dev" "VITE_API_URL=http://localhost:5050 bun run --cwd apps/client dev"
scripts.build:all: bun run build:shared-types && bun run build:shared && bun run build:importer && bun run build:cue-runner && bun run build:api-types && bun run build:cli && bun run build:api
scripts.clean:all: bun run --cwd packages/shared-types clean && bun run --cwd packages/shared clean && bun run --cwd packages/importer clean && bun run --cwd packages/cue-runner clean && bun run --cwd packages/api-types clean && bun run --cwd packages/cli clean && bun run --cwd apps/api clean
scripts.docs:site:dev: bun run docs:tsdoc && uvx --with mkdocs-material --with pymdown-extensions --with mkdocs-git-revision-date-localized-plugin mkdocs serve --config-file docs/config/mkdocs.yml --dev-addr 0.0.0.0:8000
scripts.docs:site:build: bun run docs:tsdoc && uvx --with mkdocs-material --with pymdown-extensions --with mkdocs-git-revision-date-localized-plugin mkdocs build --config-file docs/config/mkdocs.yml
scripts.docs:site:preview: bun run docs:site:build && bun run docs:site:serve
scripts.test: PORT=0 bun test packages/importer packages/cue-runner packages/shared packages/shared-types packages/cli/src apps/api --recursive && bun run --cwd apps/client test
scripts.quality: bun run format:check && bun run lint && bun run typecheck
scripts.quality:fix: bun run format && bun run check && bun run typecheck
scripts.validate: bun run quality && bun run test
scripts.dev:full:oauth: concurrently "bun run typecheck:watch" "bun scripts/dev-oauth-server.ts" "NODE_ENV=development AUTH_REQUIRED=true ARBITER_CONFIG_PATH=apps/api/config.dev-oauth.json bun run --cwd apps/api dev" "VITE_API_URL=http://localhost:5050 bun run --cwd apps/client dev"

author: Nathan Rice
